review: Installation was very easy. We tested streaming to the device pretty thoroughly last night with great results. We streamed from two different Android phones, a laptop and a desktop PC. We tried every supported app (YouTube, Netflix, Google Play Movies, Google Play Music) and streaming from the Chrome browser on the laptop and desktop. We streamed Vudu and HBOGO from a tab in the Chrome Browser with very good quality. I also briefly viewed some other websites (eBay, Facebook) also with good results. I watched video on Facebook, etc. Everything worked well. Great product! Great price!
author: SunYehoshua

review: great when it works.  great casting from a smart phone, but laggy from a pc (even when casting at low quality).  if you plan on using this with an android phone, install real player cloud (free) to cast local videos/photos so you are not just limited to netflix, youtube, etc.
author: jcam

review: It said on the description that it can be used with a laptop,well google couldn't even get it to work,they said it should work with vista,well it didn't.
author: Christine Boles
